pages.title: Wildfire
pages.text: Wildfire is a runic power that imbues the wielder's weapon with the $(#d1422c)$(l)essence of fire and combustion$(). $(br2)It grants the wielder a chance to combust all nearby enemies of the same type into flames with each successful hit.

Wildfire is a powerful runic power that can disrupt the flow of battle and give the wielder a strategic advantage. $(br2)It's ideal for characters that are focused on dealing large amount of damage over time, such as pyromancers, warlocks, and summoners.
